content: > espace tricot is a yarn store in > montreal canada discover our yarns > here www espacetricot com 1 needles 7mm / us 10 75 adapting the pattern developed for our missoni inspired scarf 1 this luxurious throw is knit using 4 shades of cascade eco cloud - a soft 70% merino / 30% alpaca blend with a chainette construction 4 skeins 1810 colour a 4 skeins 1806 colour b 2 skeins 1801 colour c 2 skeins 1809 colour d a perfect cozy blanket this pattern is easily sized upwards / downwards
